key_finding: Location has a significant impact on demand
details: Variation in demand across neighborhoods shows the importance of location in rental attraction.

key_finding: Price has an optimal point for maximizing demand
details: The demand-price curve shows an optimal point beyond which higher prices decrease demand.

key_finding: Property and room type combinations affect demand differently
details: Room type has a stronger impact on demand than property type, with entire homes being most desirable.

key_finding: Host experience and superhost status impact demand
details: Both experience and superhost status positively impact demand, with an interactive effect.

key_finding: Different neighborhoods have different optimal price points
details: Different neighborhoods have different optimal price points that maximize demand.
